title: Part 540 - Rules For Appeals From Pretrial Findings Of Mental Retardation In Capital Cases
content:
Part 540 - Rules For Appeals From Pretrial Findings Of Mental Retardation In Capital Cases

State Regulations
§ 540.0 - Preamble
§ 540.1 - Delegation to the presiding justices of the Appellate Division

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
